name: Arbiter

skills.name: Gaze of Justice
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Double hit at 1.8x ATK per hit. Total: 3.6x ATK if both hits land on same target.
30% base chance per hit, 50% fully booked. Weaken reduces enemy ATK and DEF by 25%. Two chances to apply. Requires accuracy check.

skills.book_value: Medium priority - +10% damage and +20% debuff chance (30%→50% per hit). Book after A3 and A4.
skills.notes: Double-hit A1 with Weaken. Two independent 50% chances when fully booked = high Weaken uptime. Weaken is valuable for reducing enemy damage and increasing team damage output.

skills.name: Enforced Humility (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 1 time. Has a 75% chance of decreasing the duration of all enemy buffs by 1 turn.

effects.notes: AOE damage at 2.2x ATK multiplier. Decent damage for a support.
75% base chance, 100% fully booked. Decreases ALL enemy buffs by 1 turn duration. Not a strip, but reduces buff uptime. Counters buff-heavy teams. Requires accuracy check.

skills.book_value: Medium-high priority - +10% damage and +25% debuff chance (75%→100%). 100% buff reduction is strong for Arena.
skills.notes: AOE buff duration reduction. At 100% chance (fully booked), reliably counters buff-heavy defenses in Arena. Reduces buff uptime by 1 turn on all enemies. Does NOT strip buffs instantly, but weakens them. Strong against Shield, Strengthen, Unkillable, etc.

skills.name: Mentor of Heroes (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description: Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 30% and places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Heals all allies by 25% of their MAX HP if they have less than 50% HP.

effects.notes: 30% TM boost to all allies. Massive turn cycling and speed advantage.
50% Increase ATK buff on all allies for 2 turns. Boosts team damage significantly.
Conditional heal: 25% of each ally's MAX HP if they are below 50% HP. Safety net for low-health allies.

skills.book_value: HIGHEST priority - reduces cooldown 4→3 turns. Essential for Arena and dungeon speed cycling.
skills.notes: Signature support skill. 30% TM boost + 50% ATK buff + conditional heal. Enables speed tuning and blitz strategies. Cooldown reduction (4→3) is critical for uptime. Core skill for Arena (TM boost after Arbiter's speed lead) and dungeons (turn cycling).

skills.name: Destiny’s Call (Cooldown: 7 turns)
skills.description: Revives all dead allies to 35% HP, then fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 20%. Grants an Extra Turn to this Champion if an ally was successfully revived.

effects.notes: Revives ALL dead allies to 35% of their MAX HP. Team-wide revive is extremely rare and powerful.
20% TM boost to all allies (including revived). Gives revived allies immediate turn advantage.
Grants Extra Turn to Arbiter if any ally was revived. Allows immediate follow-up (often A3 for ATK buff + more TM).

skills.book_value: HIGHEST priority - reduces cooldown 7→5 turns. Game-changing for safety and clutch Arena wins.
skills.notes: Game-defining skill. Only champion in game with team-wide revive. Revive all allies → TM boost → Extra Turn (if revive triggered) → usually follow with A3 for ATK buff. Clutch potential in Arena (revive + nuke). Essential for safe dungeon runs and Doom Tower progression. Cooldown reduction (7→5) is mandatory.

forms.aura: Increases Ally SPD in the Arena by 30%.
forms.comments: Form-specific notes, edge cases, or user/community feedback.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC, HP%/DEF%, C.RATE for Weaken uptime - good support but not S-tier for CB
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 260+ SPD, 200+ ACC, HP%/DEF% - top-tier for speed farming and safety (revive)
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 300+ SPD, 200+ ACC, HP%/DEF%, RES - best Arena support in game (30% speed aura + TM boost)
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: 260+ SPD, 220+ ACC, HP%/DEF%, RES - excellent for boss safety and wave control
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: 260+ SPD, 200+ ACC, HP%/DEF% - MVP for High Elf FW (revive + TM boost)

recommended_gear: Primary Arena: Speed + Perception (maximize SPD for speed lead + TM boost)
Alternative: Speed + Accuracy (for buff reduction and Weaken)
Stats: SPD boots (mandatory), HP%/DEF% chest, HP%/DEF% gloves, ACC/RES banner

Defense tree: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution

Defense tree: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Improved Parry, Bloodthirst

Defense tree: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Improved Parry, Deterrence, Retribution
doom_tower: Support tree: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Rapid Response, Lore of Steel, Cycle of Magic, Lasting Gifts, Merciful Aid
Defense tree: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution
faction_wars: Support tree: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Rapid Response, Lore of Steel, Cycle of Magic, Lasting Gifts, Merciful Aid

general: Support tree with Lasting Gifts and Merciful Aid. No T6 needed (support role).

blessings: Phantom Touch (best - speed boost on A3/A4 use)
Brimstone (if used in HP Burn teams)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI is excellent - prioritizes A4 for revive (clutch saves), A3 for TM boost/ATK buff, A2 for buff reduction. No issues on auto.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Arena blitz/revive cheese, speed manipulation specialist
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Arbiter is THE premium Arena champion. 30% speed aura + A3 TM boost enables speed tuning and first-turn advantage. A4 team revive allows clutch comeback wins (revive team → Extra Turn → A3 ATK buff → team nukes). Enables 2:1 and 3:1 speed tuning in all content. Can solo-carry Arena offense and Faction Wars with revive safety net.

mechanics_advisory: Best Arena support champion in the game. 30% Arena speed aura (best in class) + A3 TM boost (30%) + ATK buff = guaranteed first-turn advantage and team-wide damage boost. A4 team revive (only one in game) provides unmatched safety for dungeons, Doom Tower, and clutch Arena wins. A2 buff duration reduction counters buff-heavy Arena defenses. Fully book A3 (4→3 CD) and A4 (7→5 CD) for maximum impact. User Priority: Arena (Priority 4 - but Arbiter is S-tier), Dungeons (Priority 2), Faction Wars (High Elf near completion - Priority 5). Arbiter is MUST-BUILD for all content and game-defining for Arena.
citations: RaidWiki + Ayumilove stats validated via scraper
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: GAME-DEFINING legendary. Best Arena support (30% speed aura + TM boost). Only champion with team-wide revive. Core for Arena (10/10), Dungeons (10/10), and Faction Wars (10/10). User Priority: Arena (Priority 4), Dungeons (Priority 2 - HP Burn preference but Arbiter fits any comp), Faction Wars (High Elf near completion - Priority 5). FULLY BOOK A3 and A4 immediately. Build for maximum speed (300+) in Arena.

update_notes.last_patch: Initial entry creation - Hybrid workflow (scraper stats + AI research)
